# isEmphasized

**Instance Property**

Determines whether the row will draw with the alternate or secondary color (unless overridden).

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isEmphasized: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When emphasized is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the view will draw with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/alternateSelectedControlColor] defined by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor]. When [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] it will use the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/secondarySelectedControlColor] defined by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor].

## Related Documentation

- **Table View Programming Guide for Mac**
- **Drag and Drop Programming Topics**

## Display Style

- **interiorBackgroundStyle**: Specifies how the subviews should draw.
- **isFloating**: Specifies whether the row is drawn using the floating style.
